author: ETA PRIME
description:
I first saw The MCON COntroller at CES, and from the prototype to now, it’s come a long way. It’s compact, fully magnetic, works on iPhone and Android, and features Hall-Effect analog triggers, GameSir Mag-Res TMR joysticks, Bluetooth multi-connect, and a clever slide-out design that turns your phone into a full-blown handheld gaming setup.
In this video, I test it across Apple Arcade, Xbox Cloud Gaming, GeForce NOW, and Steam Link, along with some emulation and fighting games. It’s sturdy, premium, and easily one of the coolest controller designs I’ve ever seen — the MCON might be the best magnetic mobile controller of 2025.
⚙️ Specs & Highlights:
* Works with MagSafe iPhones + includes Android adapter
* Hall-Effect triggers (full linear range)
* GameSir Mag-Res TMR sticks (no drift, 1000 Hz polling)
* Multi-device pairing (up to 3 devices)
* Detachable MagSafe stand + kickstand mode
* Compatible with iPhone, Galaxy, Pixel, and more
🛒 Check out the MCON Controller:👉 [Official MCON We
title: This NEW Magnetic Slide Out Controller Is Next-Level! MCON First Look

author: ETA PRIME
description:
Looks like the first upload went black screen for some viewers, so I had to re-upload this one to fix the issue
In this video, we’re diving into docked mode performance on the all-new ROG Xbox Ally X powered by the AMD Ryzen Z2 Extreme. I’ll show you how to unlock the handheld’s full potential by running a sustained 45-watt TDP, boosting both CPU and GPU performance while plugged in.
We’ll walk through settings in Armoury Crate, VRAM tweaks, fan curve tuning, and even using Universal x86 Tuning Utility to sustain high-power performance. Then we’ll benchmark a full lineup of games including Cyberpunk 2077, Spider-Man 2, Mortal Kombat 1, Forza Horizon 5, and Red Dead Redemption 2, all at 1080p.
If you’ve been wondering how much more performance the ROG Xbox Ally X can deliver in docked mode, this is the video you’ve been waiting for. #ROGXboxAllyX #HandheldGaming #DockedMode #etaprime 

Rog Xbox Ally On Amazon: https://amzn.to/4nS3YcX
Buy The ROG Xbox Ally X AT Best Buy: https://bestbuy
title: ROG XBOX ALLY X Docked Mode Tested! Unlock MAX Performance at 45W
